definitions: the impression left by a foot or shoe on the ground or a surface.
shortDefinitions: impression left by foot etc. on ground

definitions: the impact on the environment of human activity in terms of pollution, damage to ecosystems, and the depletion of natural resources

examples.text: these countries are so populous that they can have a very big footprint

shortDefinitions: impact on environment of human activity in terms of pollution

definitions: the amount of memory or disk space required by a program.
shortDefinitions: amount of memory or disk space required by program

definitions: the area occupied or affected by something

examples.text: building contractors ensured that the footprint of the former military base was reused

definitions: the area beneath an aircraft or a land vehicle that is affected by its noise or weight.
shortDefinitions: area beneath aircraft etc. affected by its noise or weight

definitions: the area in which a broadcast signal from a particular source can be received.
shortDefinitions: area in which broadcast signal can be received

definitions: the space taken up on a surface by a piece of computer hardware.
shortDefinitions: space taken up on surface by piece of hardware
